title: The Spiral Awakening
outcome: A network of citizens, aided by Lenart and Oksana, deciphers Halden's spiral code within old BCI backups. They trigger a system-wide 'spiral effect,' allowing transparent, rotating scoring that disrupts BCI authority. Neighborhoods self-organize, holding open forums and undermining Council control as a new spirit of cooperation and mutual aid takes hold.

events.description: Neighborhood circles, supported by activists and some returnees, coordinate decoding sessions. Symbols from Halden’s diaries guide the process of breaking BCI’s spiral code.

The "spiral effect" ripples through the BCI system—compliance scores become rotating, visible within communities, dissolving centralized authority. Citizens experiment with new open-allocation councils.
Local assemblies replace BCI-based appointments with open forums. Chosen facilitators rotate responsibilities daily. BCI scores lose practical impact as the city adapts quickly.
A week of relative harmony follows as communities self-manage aid, food, and housing. For the first time, Council members appear at neighborhood forums, forced to debate openly with citizens.
